snippet: Docomomo US, a nonprofit conservation organization dedicated to structures and projects of the modern movement, is now inviting submissions for the first Modernism in America Awards.
abstract: Docomomo US, nonprofit conservation organization dedicated to structures and projects of modern movement, is now inviting submissions for first Modernism in America Awards.
